```{python}
import pandas as pd
```


```{python}
utah = pd.read_csv('utah_trails.csv')
```


```{python}
pennsylvania = pd.read_csv('pennsylvania_trails.csv')
```


```{python}
indiana = pd.read_csv('indiana_trails.csv')
```


```{python}
all_trails = [utah,pennsylvania,indiana]
```


```{python}
all_trails_df = pd.concat(all_trails)
```


```{python}
all_trails_df.to_csv('all_trails.csv', index=False)
```
